import java.util.*;
import java.io.*;
import java.math.*;

class Lpalin{
	static int T;
	static int N;
	public static void main(String[] args){
		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		T = sc.nextInt();
		for(int i=0;i<T;i++){
			int[] a = new int[4];
			N = sc.nextInt();
			sc.nextLine();
			for(int j=0;j<N;j++){
				switch(sc.nextLine()){
					case "aa":
						a[0]++;
						break;
					case "ab":
						a[1]++;
						break;
					case "ba":
						a[2]++;
						break;
					case "bb":
						a[3]++;
						break;
				}
			}
			String s = "";
			if(a[0]%2==0){
				int l = a[0]/2;
				for(int j=0;j<l;j++){
					s = s + "aa";
				}
				a[0]=0;
			}
			else if(a[0]%2!=0){
				int l = (a[0]-1)/2;
				for(int j=0;j<l;j++){
					s = s + "aa";
				}
				a[0]=1;
			}
			if(a[1]<=a[2]){
				int l = a[1];
				for(int j=0;j<l;j++){
					s = s + "ab";
				}
				a[2]-=a[1];
				a[1]-=a[1];
			}
			else if(a[1]>a[2]){
				int l = a[2];
				for(int j=0;j<l;j++){
					s = s + "ab";
				}
				a[1]-=a[2];
				a[2]-=a[2];
			}
			if(a[3]%2==0){
				int l = a[3]/2;
				for(int j=0;j<l;j++){
					s = s + "bb";
				}
				a[3]=0;
			}
			else if(a[3]%2!=0){
				int l = (a[3]-1)/2;
				for(int j=0;j<l;j++){
					s = s + "bb";
				}
				a[3]=1;
			}
			String mid = "";
			if(a[0] == 1){
				mid = mid + "aa";
			}
			else if(a[3] == 1){
				mid = mid + "bb";
			}
			String srev = new StringBuffer(s).reverse().toString();
			System.out.println(s+mid+srev);
		}
	}
}
